attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many pensioners rely on the income from lifetime savings and investments to enable them to live reasonably well. This was/is an option to subscribing to a fixed private pension fund.
If interest rates drop too low and/or share dividends are restricted many pensioners will have to look to the State to bail them out! The Government should ensure that prudent pensioners are not forced onto the bread line.
